#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int num, i,j,k,l, test, a;
    string str;
    num=1;
    while(num!=0)
    {
    cin>>num;
    if(num==0)
    break;
    while(num!=0)
    {
    cin>>str;
    j=(str.length())/num;
    for(i=1; i<=num; i++)
    {
        for(k=1;k<=j;k++)
        {
            if(k%2!=0)
            {
                if(int((str[(k-1)*num+i-1])<91)&&((str[(k-1)*num+i-1])>64))
                cout<<char(int(str[(k-1)*num+i-1])+32);
                else
                cout<<str[(k-1)*num+i-1];
            }
            else
            {
                if(int((str[k*num-i])<91)&&((str[k*num-i])>64))
                cout<<char(int(str[k*num-i])+32);
                else
                cout<<str[k*num-i];
            }
        }
    }
    cout<<endl;
    break;
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
